t.t-if: (record.ttype.value=='many2one' or record.ttype.value=='one2many' or record.ttype.value=='many2many') and record.domain.value and record.domain.value != '[]'

record.is_compute_field.raw_value!=true and record.is_related_field.raw_value !=true and record.company_dependent.raw_value !=true and record.store.raw_value==false
